dmca.title: [ABUSE] Notice of claimed copyright infringement and software piracy ( 219.107.35.74
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Sunday, January 08, 2006 4:19 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; copyright@wiforums.net
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Notice of claimed copyright infringement and software
piracy ( 219.107.35.74 - erowebs.org)]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Notice of claimed copyright infringement and software
piracy ( 219.107.35.74 - erowebs.org)
Date: Sat, 7 Jan 2006 00:21:43 -0500
From: Copyright <copyright@wiforums.net>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>

Infringing Server IP Address: 219.107.35.74 (host150.theplanet.com)

CLAIM: Unauthorized use of the following software:

WiForums Full Featured 2.0 WAP discussion forum "visible source-code"
software.


Copyright issued on 04/22/2003 by the Canadian Intellectual Property Office
(CIPO)

Copyright Registration Number: 1011236

Product URL(s):

- - http://www.WiForums.net

Dear Sir/Madam,

I Thaddeus Clarke Jr., the copyright owner/holder, has determined that the
website listed below, which is located on servers that are under your
control, are using an unlicensed copyrighted copy WiForums Full Featured 2.0
WAP discussion forum "visible source-code" software.

The infringing material can be found at the following location(s):

(1) http://erowebs.org/youwhat/wap/full/ *

*The infringing material located at the above URL can only be viewed in a
WAP 1.1/WML capable browser such as Opera browser for Windows/Linux/Mac.

The two hundred and twenty-six (226) copyrighted "visible source-code" files
and images which are present in the WiForums Full Featured 2.0 WAP
discussion forum are distributed in a file named "WiForumsFull.zip". If
needed, we can provide you with the file names of all of the copyrighted
files which are present on the aforementioned website.

I expect that you will take swift action to remove and/or disable access to
the materials described above, and thereby prevent the illegal reproduction,
distribution, and use of unlicensed software via your company's network.

I attest under penalty of perjury that the foregoing information is
accurate; that I am the copyright owner of the referenced material; that I
believe in good faith that use of the referenced material in the manner
complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner or the law. I further
acknowledge that by making a false claim of infringement, I could be held
liable for damages to the copyright owner of the content that is subject of
this notification.

I appreciate your cooperation in this matter.

Please advise me regarding what actions you may take.

Sincerely,

Thaddeus Clarke Jr.
WiForums.net
Founder & Software Developer

Email: copyright@wiforums.net
Phone No: (514) 707-1032



- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFDwY/fvK/XpJs6oyURAgW8AKCAhFCBti3AclwuYAdKVCv2ZCe47QCgpNs3
UMwv2JREjn4TTofkpXo8gvg=
=Ouoj
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
